name: Timeless Space
description:
Oct 13, 2072

The space station Asteria II was attacked by the space pirate group "Starmen". All crew members were killed in the attack and the station is now in ruins.

There is no recording of the attack. That's where you come in.

You are Tom, a time ranger. Your job is to investigate Asteria's ruins and go to the past to get the recordings of the attack. But make sure you don't change the past or else ...

Made in 2 weeks for BYOG 2019 - "To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward.”

EXPLICIT LANGUAGE WARNING
